main event: On August 2, 1963, three unidentified objects were observed flying near a military aircraft in Morehead, Kentucky.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 50 to 100 feet from the aircraft and did not emit light,The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds,The objects appeared to be attached to or maneuvering in conjunction with the aircraft,The witness estimated the speed of the objects at 2,500 to 3,000 MPH,One witness reported seeing a bright object that was the size of an automobile emitting a very bright light.
sighted object: three unidentified objects near a military jet
witness description: A husband and wife who were awakened by a bright light outside their window
